definitions.body: mud, mire of streets (always in sim. of contempt, ignominious treatment) [[חוּחוֹת]] ´[[ט]] Mic 7:10, Ps 18:43 = 2Sa 22:43, Zec 9:3, Zec 10:5; of Jeremiah's dungeon Je 38:6, Je 38:6; of mire in which crocodile lies Job 41:22; cast up by sea Is 57:20 (‖[[רֶפֶשׁ]]); of a bog (fig. of distress) Ps 69:15 and [[הַיׇּוֵן]] ´[[ט]] Ps 40:3.
poet. of potter's clay (‖[[חׂמֶר]]) Is 41:25, brick-clay (‖ id.) Na 3:14.
